Html:
Hi

I am trying to use GMap for Mono under Ubuntu 11.10, I am using Monodevelop for this task. The problem I'm facing here is that when i run the program instead of be able to see the map I get a legend that says

Exception: Could not load file or assembly 
'Mono.Data.SqliteClient ,Version 2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=0738eb9f132...'

Version of Mono: Mono JIT compiler version 2.10.5 (Debian 2.10.5-1)

Version of GMap:  1.6 Power (http://greatmaps.codeplex.com/releases/view/20235)

Version of Monodevelop: 2.8.5

Any ideas of how can i solve this issue

Thanks

Logan
go to package manager and add it ;}
